name: Fujitsu Refurbished ScanSnap iX500 Scanner for PC and Mac -Does NOT include Adobe Acrobat

reviews.name: Fujitsu Refurbished ScanSnap iX500 Scanner for PC and Mac -Does NOT include Adobe Acrobat
reviews.reviewText: The Fujitsu ScanSnap is an excellent color scanner for my solo paperless law firm. This is the second scanner I purchased and it does everything it promises. The scanner looks brand new even though it is refurbished and it works perfectly. Refurbished is the way to go!!
reviews.title: A Must Have for a Paperless Office Environment

reviews.name: Fujitsu Refurbished ScanSnap iX500 Scanner for PC and Mac -Does NOT include Adobe Acrobat
reviews.reviewText:
I was contemplating buying the Neat Scanner but after looking at all the features of the Scan Snap iX500 Scanner I had to give it a try. Believe me, I was not disappointed.

If I had to described the Scan Snap iX500 Scanner by Fujitsu in one word it would be "Extraordinary". With his blazing's fast speed I can scan 25 pages, both sides of the document in less than a minute with just one touch of the button. Now how amazing is that?

Not to mention, I thought it was going to take 10-14 days and I received it in about 5 days.
reviews.title: Simply the Best!!!

reviews.name: Fujitsu Refurbished ScanSnap iX500 Scanner for PC and Mac -Does NOT include Adobe Acrobat
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a scanner but also didn't want too cheap that I would have to replace it right away. I bought the Fujitsu ScanSnap ix500 and I LOVE it. It is quiet, smooth, quick and so user friendly. Highly recommend this product!
reviews.title: Look no more! Fujitsu ScanSnap ix500 is the one!

reviews.name: Fujitsu Refurbished ScanSnap iX500 Scanner for PC and Mac -Does NOT include Adobe Acrobat
reviews.reviewText:
This scanner is amazing - lightning quick - with the new firmware, it's has true wireless functionality.
Flexible scan options - can scan to an OCR pdf generator, regular pdf, Image, email, Evernote etc.
reviews.title: Workhorse
